column2: It has come to your attention that [mep_immortal_victim_target.GetTitledName] is not mortal and cannot be slain by normal means. Your plot to kill [mep_immortal_victim_target.GetHerHim] is over.

Foolish enemies have declared war on the Forest, aiming to bring us under their rule, or perhaps extort money - their reasons are not clear to you. Nevertheless, it is time to rouse the trees to fight back!
They will find out we are strong
